🍅 **Simply Pomodoro - Your Productivity Boost!** 🚀

Simply Pomodoro is your ticket to a more organized, efficient, and distraction-free workflow. With its user-friendly controls, staying on track has never been this simple.

**🌟 Features:**

- **🖱 One-Click Control**: Dive into work or take a break with just one click.
- **🔔 Automatic Notifications**: Stay on track with automatic notifications.
- **✨ Minimalist Charm**: A clutter-free design for maximum focus.
- **🎉 Totally Free**: No hidden costs, just pure productivity.

**📘 How It Works:**
1. Start the Timer: Click the "Start" button to begin a 25 minute focused work session.
2. Work Intently: Use this period to concentrate on your task without interruptions. The timer will keep track of the time for you.
3. Take a Short Break: Once the work session ends, the timer will alert you to take a short 5 minute break.
4. Repeat: After your short break, you can start another focused work session. After completing four work sessions, you'll be prompted to take a longer, 30 minute break.
5. Stay Informed: The extension icon will change and notifications will appear to inform you of transitions between work sessions and breaks.
